seed_pair: I watched the football and then I watched a film.
Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I watched the football' → 'vi el fútbol' (verb+object). 'and then' → 'y luego' (connector phrase). Created overlap with 'vi' appearing in two contexts for recombination power (Heuristic 2). BACKWARD SWEEP: All chunks covered. VALIDATION: No standalone particles, all pass FD test.

seed_pair: He's trying to tell me what he wants
Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'He's trying' → 'está intentando' (progressive construction). 'to tell me' → 'decirme' (infinitive+pronoun, must stay together per Heuristic 1). 'what he wants' → 'lo que quiere' (relative construction). Created overlap with 'intentando decirme' for pattern practice. BACKWARD SWEEP: From 'quiere' - 'lo que quiere' correctly captures relative clause. VALIDATION: All pronouns wrapped in context.

seed_pair: He's going to ask you tomorrow.
Va a preguntarte mañana.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'He's going to' → 'va a' (future periphrastic construction). 'ask you' → 'preguntarte' (verb+pronoun must stay together). 'tomorrow' → 'mañana' (clear adverb). Created overlap 'va a preguntarte' to show complete future construction. BACKWARD SWEEP: Covered. VALIDATION: Pronoun 'te' properly embedded in verb.

seed_pair: He's just started to learn.
Acaba de empezar a aprender.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'has just started' → 'acaba de empezar' (recent past construction). 'to start to learn' → 'empezar a aprender' (verb chain with 'a'). Created overlaps to show both 'acabar de' construction and 'empezar a' pattern. BACKWARD SWEEP: 'a aprender' needs 'empezar' for clarity. VALIDATION: Preposition 'a' embedded in verb phrase.

seed_pair: He would give you an answer if he could.
Te daría una respuesta si pudiera.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'would give you' → 'te daría' (conditional+pronoun placement - pronoun MUST stay with verb per Heuristic 1). 'an answer' → 'una respuesta' (article+noun). 'if he could' → 'si pudiera' (conditional clause). Separate chunks maximize recombination (Heuristic 2). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'si pudiera' stands as conditional trigger. VALIDATION: Pronoun 'te' properly placed before verb, not standalone.

seed_pair: The man is trying to help me.
El hombre está intentando ayudarme.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'the man' → 'el hombre' (article+noun). 'is trying' → 'está intentando' (progressive). 'to help me' → 'ayudarme' (infinitive+pronoun). Created overlap 'está intentando ayudarme' to show full progressive construction. BACKWARD SWEEP: 'ayudarme' keeps pronoun attached to infinitive. VALIDATION: All particles embedded.

seed_pair: That man is going to tell me something new.
Ese hombre va a decirme algo nuevo.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'that man' → 'ese hombre' (demonstrative+noun). 'is going to' → 'va a' (future construction). 'tell me' → 'decirme' (verb+pronoun). 'something new' → 'algo nuevo' (pronoun+adjective MUST stay together per Heuristic 1 - adjective needs noun/pronoun context). Created overlaps with 'va a' appearing in multiple contexts. BACKWARD SWEEP: 'algo nuevo' correctly pairs indefinite pronoun with adjective. VALIDATION: All pronouns embedded.

seed_pair: That man has just started to practise speaking.
Ese hombre acaba de empezar a practicar el habla.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'that man' → 'ese hombre'. 'has just started' → 'acaba de empezar' (recent past). 'to practise' → 'a practicar' (infinitive construction). 'speaking' → 'el habla' (article+noun, referring to speech/speaking). Created overlaps with 'acaba de empezar' and 'empezar a practicar'. BACKWARD SWEEP: 'el habla' is nominalized verb form. VALIDATION: All particles embedded.

seed_pair: That woman would help you if she could.
Esa mujer te ayudaría si pudiera.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'that woman' → 'esa mujer' (demonstrative+noun). 'would help you' → 'te ayudaría' (conditional+pronoun - MUST stay together per Heuristic 1). 'if she could' → 'si pudiera' (conditional clause). Parallel structure to S0225 but with 'esa mujer' instead of subject pronoun. BACKWARD SWEEP: Conditional 'si pudiera' captures full clause. VALIDATION: Pronoun 'te' properly positioned with verb, not standalone.

seed_pair: I know a young man who wants to work with you.
Conozco a un hombre joven que quiere trabajar contigo.
seeds.extraction_notes: FORWARD SWEEP: 'I know' → 'conozco a' (verb+personal 'a' for people). 'a young man' → 'un hombre joven' (article+noun+adjective, note Spanish word order). 'who wants' → 'que quiere' (relative clause). 'to work with you' → 'trabajar contigo' (infinitive+prepositional pronoun). BACKWARD SWEEP: 'contigo' is fused prepositional pronoun, must stay with verb per Heuristic 1. VALIDATION: Personal 'a' embedded, 'contigo' not standalone.
